name: Airstralian
description:
Controls:
Click and drag with your mouse to ready a gust of wind to move your boomerang, and release it to send it flying

Step into the shoes of the mythical "Airstralian" on his quest to find the treasures of the Kangaruins. Harness the power of wind to maneuver your boomerang through the ruins and collect all the treasure!

If the boomerang collides with a rock or wall an ancient curse will activate, returning it to you but making you lose all your progress.

Created for Ludum Dare 47 with the theme "Stuck in a Loop".
